meanings.definition: Skillful or clever in using the hands or mind.
meanings.sent1: She is the adroitest painter in our art class.
meanings.sent2: The adroitest chef in the kitchen effortlessly creates delicious dishes.
meanings.sent3: The adroitest juggler in the circus amazed the audience with his skillful tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her adroitest move in the game of chess left her opponent speechless.
meanings.sent5: The adroitest magician in town could make anything disappear with a flick of his wand.

meanings.definition: Showing skill or cleverness in handling situations.
meanings.sent1: He is the adroitest problem solver in our team.
meanings.sent2: The adroitest negotiator always finds a win-win solution.
meanings.sent3: The adroitest detective in the mystery novel cracked the case in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her adroitest decision in the boardroom turned the company's fortunes around.
meanings.sent5: The adroitest pilot safely landed the plane in challenging weather conditions.
